__e: I'm sorry if I sound callous, but I assure you I had nothing to do with that young man's death.
Not to be insensitive, but it is lucky you found her body when you did.
They may know they do dishonest or manipulative things... but think there's a good reason for it.
Numb is probably exactly what you need right now.
You could be quite numb, and you'll probably have a headache that lasts anywhere from, say, three to six months.
For the first time, when confronted with a horrible person I knew what I wanted to say, and I said it.
